controller
Class DatabaseConnector

java.lang.Object
  controller.DatabaseConnector

 class DatabaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object

A helper class for managing connections to the SQLite database.
Is of default visibility (as are all methods at the most) so that no access happens from outside of the controller package. This is to limit the classes that have direct access to these methods. Most are indirectly available when using AvailableItems.

Author:
217262

Constant Field Values

conn

private java.sql.Connection conn
Connection to the database, should be synchronized when used to prevent problems with multiple connections. (Which should be supported by the JDBC SQLite but caused errors on Windows...)

Gets a specific Recipe from the database based on ID.

Parameters:
recipeID - the ID to search by
Returns:
the first (and only) recipe with matching ID, or null if no such entry exists

updateRecipe

int updateRecipe(Recipe recipe)
Updates a Recipe in the database. If the recipe has an ID of null, it will be inserted as a new entry and return the newly generated ID.

Parameters:
recipe - the recipe to update.
Returns:
the ID of the updated/inserted recipe

updateIngredient

int updateIngredient(Ingredient ingredient)
Updates an Ingredient in the database. If the ingredient has an ID of null, it will be inserted as a new entry and return the newly generated ID.

Parameters:
ingredient - teh ingredient to update
Returns:
the ID of the updated/inserted ingredient

removeListedItem

private void removeListedItem(ListedItem item,
                              java.lang.String tableName,
                              java.lang.String idColumn,
                              java.lang.String relationshipColumn)
Helper method. Removes a ListedItem from the specified table.
Also removes the relationship bindings from the many-to-many relationship table to be sure, although the table is configured to remove these by itself.

Parameters:
item - the item to be removed from the table
tableName - the table from which to remove
idColumn - the name of the column containing the ID value
relationshipColumn - the column in the relationship table that represents the same ID value

addChangeListener

void addChangeListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener)
Registers a ChangeListener with this database, that will be informed when the database contents change.

Parameters:
listener - the ChangeListener object

fireChangeEvent

protected void fireChangeEvent()
Calls the ChangeListener.stateChanged(ChangeEvent) method of all listeners registered on this database.
